casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A.
v.
Joanne R. RICCI a/k/a Joanne R. Pilchesky and Joseph Pilchesky Petition of: Joseph Pilchesky No. 548 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 21, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 21st day of February, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
